panels.description: Number of UTXOs owned by address types we support.
panels.title: # Address UTXOs

panels.description:
The difference between the target stability and the actual stability.

If the value is positive, there are too many unstable blocks, and some blocks should be marked as stable.

If the value is negative, there aren't enough unstable blocks yet.
panels.title: Difficulty-Based Stability (Target - Current)

panels.description: Note: Using a magic number `8181818181` in the query turns `NaN` values from zeros to chart gaps.
panels.title: API Access

panels.description: Note: Using a magic number `8181818181` in the query turns `NaN` values from zeros to chart gaps.
panels.title: Bitcoin Canister Height Diff

panels.description: The number of instructions required to insert a block into the stable UTXO set
panels.title: Stable Block Insertion Instruction Count
